=== Current Issues ===
* Sound does not work. "audiotestsrc wave=sine freq=512 ! audioconvert ! audioresample ! gconfaudiosink: Resource busy or not available." see http://pastebin.ca/875520
* The battery says: "Battery discharge time is currently unknown"
* SD card reader does not work.
